mapper.insert: insert into dictionary (id, CODE_TYPE, code_key, value, CODE_DESC, VALID_FLAG, ORDER_ID, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update dictionary set CODE_TYPE = #{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_key = #{codeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE_DESC = #{codeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VALID_FLAG = #{validFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BIT}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_id = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, CODE_TYPE, code_key, value, CODE_DESC, VALID_FLAG, ORDER_ID, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from dictionary where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, CODE_TYPE, code_key, value, CODE_DESC, VALID_FLAG, ORDER_ID, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from dictionary

select id, CODE_TYPE, code_key, value, CODE_DESC, VALID_FLAG, ORDER_ID, del_flg, version, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time from DICTIONARY where VALID_FLAG = '0' and CODE_TYPE = #{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_flg=0
